knimeNode.name: DESeq
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node can detect differential expressed genes using the DESeq package.

fullDescription.intro: This node can find differential expressed genes using the DESeq package. It takes as input a count table and a annotation file.
fullDescription.option: method which is used for calculation of the empirical dispersion (default: pooled)
sharing mode after empirical dispersion was calculated (default: maximum)

ports.inPort:
Cell 0: ID of feature
Cell 1...n: count of feature in sample
Must contain a header line with the names of the samples

Cell 0: Name of the sample like it is named in the count table
Cell 1: condition (should only contain two conditions)
ports.outPort:
Cell 0: ID of feature
Cell 1: average log2 CPM expression
Cell 2: log2 CPM A expression
Cell 3: log2 CPM B expression
Cell 4: foldchange
Cell 5: log2 foldchange
Cell 6: P-Value
Cell 7: adjusted P-Value (corrected with BH)
